name: Shoot
overview: Compilation disc containing the 7 games: IF-22 Space Rebellion War Drones Wanted G-Squad Ace Air Rescue. Most of these games were released separately by Phoenix with other names. In the game the player take the role of a gunfighter, a ninja, a pilot of a space ship or a pilot of mecha and have to make his through different missions destroying all the enemies that comes his way.
